mapper.insert: insert into words (id, dictionary_id, spelling, pronunciation, explanation) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dictionaryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{spelling,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pronunciation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{explanation,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, dictionary_id, spelling, pronunciation, explanation from words

select id, dictionary_id, spelling, pronunciation, explanation from words where not exists (select 1 from vocabulary where vocabulary.words_id = words.id and vocabulary.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}) and exists ( select 1 from dictionary,user_dictionary where dictionary.id = words.dictionary_id and dictionary.valid_flag='Y' and user_dictionary.dictionary_id = dictionary.id and user_dictionary.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
